lead_paragraph: ADES--Alan M. The Metropolitan Opera mourns the death of Alan M. Ades, a loyal and devoted friend of the Met, who was a distinguished member of the Board for almost 25 years. Mr. Ades served as a Member of the Association from 1987 to 1999, and as an Advisory Director from 1999 to 2011. On behalf of everyone at the Met, we extend our sincere condolences to his wife, Member of the Association Joan Taub Ades, his daughters Jane and Susan Ades, and his family and friends. He will be missed, but his kindness to the Met will always be remembered. Ann Ziff, Chairman of the Board Judith-Ann Corrente, President & CEO Peter Gelb, General Manager 1/3
